sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_slackerbot_parser"> <x_snc_slackerbot_parser action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <activation_example>!hacktoberfest</activation_example> <active>true</active> <description>Hacktoberfest</description> <emoji/> <flags>gmi</flags> <include_in_help>true</include_in_help> <order/> <regex>!hacktoberfest</regex> <script><![CDATA[/* activation_example:!hacktoberfest regex:!hacktoberfest flags:gmi */ var message = '*Hacktoberfest*: a month-long celebration of open-source projects, their maintainers, and the entire community of contributors.

 How to participate?
 - Register on the <https://hacktoberfest.com/|official hacktoberfest website>
 - Make four contributions to open source before October 31

 Participants who complete Hacktoberfest will receive these prizes: from DigitalOcean, the Hacktoberfest 2024 holopin. From ServiceNow: A community badge (4 accepted Pull Requests to eligible projects), ServiceNow Merch to top contributors, and the main ServiceNow Hacktoberfest repo (https://github.com/ServiceNowDevProgram/Hacktoberfest) has a leaderboard to track all of our top contributors for this year and all-time.!
 For more information, please see: https://hacktoberfest.com/, <https://www.servicenow.com/community/developer-advocate-blog/servicenow-hacktoberfest-2024/ba-p/3052690/|Blog on Hacktoberfest>, and join us at our channels: <#C01C0RWV32M|hacktoberfest>, <#CKJ2TE0AK|slacker-dev-public>'; var send_chat = new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat(current, message, true); ]]></script> <stop_processing>false</stop_processing> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-10-01 00:28:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d8a626dc53051690f2731901a0490e78</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-10-01 00:35:32</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_slackerbot_parser> </record_update>
